QAPair.Question: Do you have information about COPD - what to ask your doctor
QAPair.Answer: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) damages your lungs. This can make it hard for you to get enough oxygen and clear carbon dioxide from your lungs. While there is no cure for COPD, you can do many things to control your symptoms and make your life better. Below are some questions you may want to ask your health care provider to help you take care of your lungs.
